author: julianfoad
msg: Rename some API parameters for consistency.  This does not constitute an API
or ABI change.  (The parameters are only within a pointer-to-function type.)
parameters to 'copyfrom_path' and 'copyfrom_revision' to match its doc
string and for consistency with add_dir() and many (but not all) functions
